name: ResilientEntrepreneur
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Stay motivated with authentic stories told by entrepreneurs about their ups and downs in their entrepreneurial journey. 

Fact: Each year, thousands of ambitious entrepreneurs start new businesses. They feel bright and full of hope; they dream big. Some of the common reasons why people start new businesses are that they are ready to be their own bosses, want to pursue their passion, or they see the opportunity they can't miss. Yet, plenty of small business statistics show that by the end of four years, more than half of them will be gone. Roughly about 80 percent of new businesses will make it to the second year. Commonly stated reasons, why entrepreneurs fail is to do with no market need for products or services or running out of cash or not having the right team. But, there is underlying stress on the founder around all these factors, and more. Having the right mental attitude to survive your business is critical. 

This briefing leads the way in entrepreneur resilience. The goal of the podcast is to support fellow entrepreneurs on their journey, helping them overcome their doubts, issues, and problems that we all face as we break out or are forced out of the corporate world. 
Every week there will be a post about my interview podcast featuring insights and learnings from an entrepreneur who is willing to share their story. This show airs every week and is available as a podcast everywhere, a complete episode list can be found here https://katerinathomas.com/shows/podcast

Start here with weekly interviews by Dr Katerina Thomas, educator and strategist and speaker on entrepreneurial resilience. 


YOUR HOST:
Katerina Thomas is an educator and entrepreneur. Katerina helps visionary entrepreneurs to ban fears and anxiety by developing emotional resilience and by building mental wealth. She teaches business owners to pivot by becoming more creative and innovative. Throughout her professional life, she helped hundreds of entrepreneurs to launch their business following their passion. Katerina hosts a weekly podcast interviewing entrepreneurs helping to combat the stigma around anxiety and fear.

Read the blog, access the podcast and videos, or request a consultation: 
katerinathomas.com

TOPICS IN THIS BRIEFING: 

Dealing with uncertainty, fear and anxiety
Business with emotional and business challenges
Surviving the Dip
Mental Wealth strategies

PODCAST: Mental Wealth For Entrepreneurs Podcast is everywhere. https://katerinathomas.com/shows/podcast
Or 1-click subscribe free: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/mental-wealth-for-entrepreneurs/id1507205278
